Name: Manveer
description:
My name is Manveer Singh and I own a coffee business, Maharajah Coffee. Please see below for a video and an article describing Maharajah Coffee and what we stand for. I am deaf and aside from being able to provide customers with fresh coffee, I want to show others that have a disability that you can do anything you put your mind to, you just have to stay positive and believe in yourself. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TJJgVZsr-t0&t=1s

https://richmondmagazine.com/restaurants-in-richmond/manveer-singh-maharajah-coffee/
